context_of_use: This use case allows customers to track their order status and managers to review and approve orders within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: to know the delivery status of their orders
manager: to ensure timely approval of orders
description: This use case enables customers to track their orders and allows managers to approve those orders, ensuring efficient order processing.
triggering_event: Customer requests to track an order or manager receives an order for approval.
preconditions: Manager has pending orders to approve
assumptions: The system has access to current order statuses
Managers have the necessary permissions to approve orders
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders
The system shall allow managers to approve orders
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the notification process for order status updates
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to track an order → System retrieves and displays the current order status.
2. Manager reviews pending orders → System displays the list of pending orders.
3. Manager selects an order to approve → System processes the approval and updates the order status.
